context: Do you recommend the book Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets for my 10 year old niece?
If your niece is into Fiction then yes I do. Harry Potter is popular with children that age.
Great! Now that will be a good present for her birthday. May I know the name of the author please?
Thanks! Are there any other books by the same author?
The Casual Vacancy was also written by J.K. Rowling.
May I know the genre of that book please? If it is comedy I would definitely prefer it.
The book is in the genre of Black Comedy.
Are there any Black Comedy examples in Drama genre and Fantasy Genre?
Yes. Withnail and I is also in the genre of Black Comedy.
My question was in Drama and Fantasy genres and examples of Black Comedy
entity: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
resp: I'm sorry I misunderstood the question. True Blood is in the both Drama and Fantasy and the Hotel New Hapmshire is an exaple of black comedy.
